partintro.para: query-plugin is composed of sample codes to guide basic usage of Query Service that supports easy execution of various functions such as execution of XML-based query statements through extension/use of Spring JdbcTemplate, mapping of query results into specific objects, paging of query results for each DB, OR mapping, execution of Dynamic Query and execution of Callable Statement and reference libraries necessary to use these open sources.
Install query-plugin by entering the following command in the Command window.
The installation result can be checked by using the installed (mvn anyframe:installed) or the jetty:run (mvn clean jetty:run) commands.
